commit message:
[issue #168] Fix for GPX files not visible on external storage

Force the media scanner to scan the newly created GPX file.
[issue #43] Initial work on OSM upload: Additional track fields

[issue #43] Further work on OSM upload

Implemented OAuth and upload. Basics are working but still needs a lot of
work (error handling, better UI, ...).

[issue #43] Store OAuth token/secret in preferences

Will prevent OSMTracker to ask the user to log in OSM and authorize OSMTracker
for each upload.
[issue #43] Further work on OSM upload: Error handling, UI.

[issue #43] Further work on OSM upload

Store upload date in DB, display it in track details, display upload icon in
track list.
Minor other UI tweaks.
